statements: SELECT * FROM legal_document_versions WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, revision_number FROM legal_document_versions WHERE revision_number > 5;
SELECT * FROM legal_document_versions WHERE is_compliant = TRUE;
SELECT reviewer_name, revision_date FROM legal_document_versions WHERE document_name LIKE '%policy%';
SELECT * FROM legal_document_versions WHERE revision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT document_id, document_name, revision_number, revision_date, reviewer_name, is_compliant FROM legal_document_versions WHERE is_compliant = true ORDER BY revision_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT document_name, reviewer_name FROM legal_document_versions WHERE revision_number > 3 AND is_compliant = false ORDER BY document_name ASC
SELECT * FROM legal_document_versions WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT document_id, revision_date FROM legal_document_versions WHERE is_compliant = true ORDER BY document_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT reviewer_name, COUNT(*) as revision_count FROM legal_document_versions GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING revision_count > 1 ORDER BY revision_count DESC
SELECT document_name, version_number FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE version_number = 2;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, revision_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE version_number > 1;
SELECT document_id, document_name, version_number FROM LegalDocuments WHERE revision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE version_number > 1 ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, revision_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE version_number >= 1 ORDER BY revision_date ASC;

SELECT document_name, revised_by FROM LegalDocuments JOIN DocumentRevisions ON LegalDocuments.document_id = DocumentRevisions.document_id WHERE DocumentRevisions.revised_by LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY DocumentRevisions.revision_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, revision_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revision_date ASC;

SELECT document_name, revisions_notes FROM LegalDocuments JOIN DocumentRevisions ON LegalDocuments.document_id = DocumentRevisions.document_id WHERE DocumentRevisions.revisions_notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DocumentRevisions.revision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_name, version FROM legal_documents ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT owner_name, document_id FROM document_owners WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT revision_id, revision_description FROM revisions WHERE revision_number > 3;
SELECT document_name, revision_date FROM legal_documents WHERE revision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE version > 1 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, version FROM legal_documents WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ld.document_name, do.owner_name FROM legal_documents ld INNER JOIN document_owners do ON ld.id = do.document_id;
SELECT ld.document_name, r.revision_number, r.revision_description FROM legal_documents ld JOIN revisions r ON ld.id = r.document_id WHERE r.revision_number > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT ld.document_name, r.revision_description FROM legal_documents ld JOIN revisions r ON ld.id = r.document_id WHERE r.revision_number BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY r.revision_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_name, compliance_status FROM legal_documents;
SELECT revision_number, revised_by FROM document_revisions;
SELECT document_id, version_number, created_at FROM document_versions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM revision_history WHERE approved_by='Admin';
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT revision_date, document_name, version FROM legal_documents ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, version, compliance_status FROM legal_documents WHERE version > 2 ORDER BY version ASC;
SELECT document_name, version, compliance_status FROM legal_documents WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND version <= 3;
SELECT document_name, revision_number, revised_by FROM legal_documents LEFT JOIN document_revisions ON legal_documents.id = document_revisions.version_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_title, version_number FROM legal_documents WHERE version_number > 1;
SELECT category_name FROM document_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(revision_id) AS num_revisions FROM document_revisions GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT editor_name, version_date FROM document_versions WHERE editor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY version_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_title, version_number, revision_date FROM legal_documents WHERE version_number > 5;
SELECT document_id, document_title, version_number FROM legal_documents ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_title, category_name FROM legal_documents JOIN document_categories ON legal_documents.document_id = document_categories.category_id;
SELECT document_id, document_title, editor_name FROM legal_documents JOIN document_versions ON legal_documents.document_id = document_versions.document_id;
